methods.body: main | controller | [ self initializeApplication. controller := EmployeeManagementController instance. controller start. ] on: Error do: [:ex | Transcript show: 'Application startup failed: ', ex messageText; cr. ex pass. ]

initializeApplication Transcript show: 'Starting Employee Management System...'; cr.
EmployeeService initialize.
Transcript show: 'Employee Management System initialized successfully.'; cr.
description ^'A complete employee management system built with ObjectStudio ANSI Smalltalk featuring CRUD operations, data validation, Windows GUI, and persistent storage.'
stop EmployeeManagementController reset. Transcript show: 'Employee Management System stopped.'; cr.
